definition: Hertz (name)/Heinrich Hertz (1857-1894), German physicist and meteorologist, pioneer of electromagnetic radiation
Hertz (name)/Heinrich Hertz (1857-1894), German physicist and meteorologist, pioneer of electromagnetic radiation
Grozny, capital of Chechen Republic, Russia
Łódź, third largest city of Poland

sentences.english: Ziggy over there never even met his kid.
sentences.chinese: 那边的兹基甚至从没见过他的孩子。

sentences.english: I certify that the above particulars are true and correct.
sentences.chinese: 本人兹证明上述各项资料真实无讹。

sentences.english: It is planted the tree out of the poppy flower has history.
sentences.chinese: 栽下兹提树开出罂栗花的曾经历史。

sentences.english: This changes when Mr Kaletsky analyses the financial crisis.
sentences.chinese: 卡里兹基对金融危机的分析却有所不同。

sentences.english: I am enclosing a check for$125 as payment in full.
sentences.chinese: 兹附上一百二十五元支票一张作为全部的付款。

sentences.english: I am enclosing my resume together with my photo, and I believe that they may be found satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 兹随函附履历表及照片一份，希望阁下能够满意。

sentences.english: Nemeth cut her payroll and found a bank to help.
sentences.chinese: 妮米兹削减了自己的工资，并且找了一家银行贷款。

sentences.english: We refer to our Order No. 532 for women's blouses and sweaters.
sentences.chinese: 兹谈及我方532号女式衬衫及毛衣的订单。

sentences.english: Mr Bouazizi's picture hangs in the main street, now named after him.
sentences.chinese: 布亚齐兹的照片悬挂在以他的名字命名的大街上。

sentences.english: The people had been headed from Nimruz to Herat in western Afghanistan as part of a wedding party.
sentences.chinese: 人们从尼姆鲁兹到阿富汗西部的赫拉特去参加婚礼。

sentences.english: Hernandez and Abbott. What about the rest?
sentences.chinese: 贺南德兹和阿巴，其他人呢？

sentences.english: Enclosed is some additional technical information on the probers.
sentences.chinese: 兹附上探测器之附加技术资料。

sentences.english: We certify that the goods named above have been supplied in conformity with order No. 12345.
sentences.chinese: 兹证明本发票所列货物与合同号12345相符。

sentences.english: I have granted power of procuration to my chief clerk , mr . y . yada , whose signature is appended below.
sentences.chinese: 兹授予矢田次郎先生代理我公司签名权，其签名如下。

sentences.english: Neil, the new chairman of the Bury St. Edmunds branch of the National Front, called me at home from a pay phone in a pub.
sentences.chinese: 英国民族阵线党伯里圣埃德蒙兹支部的新主席叫尼尔。
